Title: Show and Prove
Writer: George Pelecanos (created by), David Simon (created by), Richard Price, George Pelecanos
Actors: James Franco, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Gbenga Akinnagbe, Chris Bauer
Plot: Vincent's failing marriage forces him to move into a seedy Times Square hotel, but his success drawing customers to a struggling Korean bar brings a tempting offer from Mafia capo Rudy Pipilo.
